universal_guidelines: Use 'Chivo' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Ensure high contrast for all text (WCAG AA compliance).
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; stick to solid colors or subtle noise textures.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a client-side React application. Focus on the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' aesthetic. The app is a tool, so prioritize function and clarity. Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard summary. For the PDF generation, use 'jspdf' and 'html2canvas' to render the report view. Ensure the report looks like a professional A4 document.
